name: French West Indian Sauce Chien
keywords: habañero, italian parsley, lime juice, raw, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 Scotch bonnet or habanero chili, seeded and quartered
1/4 cup chopped fresh chives or scallion greens
1 scant teaspoon salt, or more, to taste
1/3 cup fresh lime juice, or more, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the garlic, shallots, chili, ginger, parsley and chives in a food processor. Add remaining ingredients, and process just to mix. Add 1/4 cup boiling water, and process to mix. Run the machine in short bursts until you have a coarse puree. If desired, add more salt or lime juice, to taste. The sauce can be served immediately, but it becomes more flavorful if you let it sit for an hour.
